title: Surface bypass-rate metrics in Sales_Accelerator manager dashboard

sections.text: Add a lightweight “Bypass rate” panel to the manager/sales ops dashboard that reads from the existing bypass event data in the analytics warehouse. Show bypass rate and counts segmented by workflow (best-next-action, forecast updates, risk alerts) and team, with a simple date range filter (last 7/30 days). This enables teams to detect organizational drift early without adding new event instrumentation or schemas.
